channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: My 7 key takeaways from PromCon 2019
item.description: PromCon is one of the premier conference on Prometheus and related tools like Grafana. This is held every year where developers from around the world gather to learn the latest in monitoring technologies.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Getting to know our 4000+ stargazers on GitHub
item.description: SigNoz crossed 4000+ stars recently. In this article, we dig deep to find out about our GitHub stargazers using a tool called Stargazers.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Cost benchmarking - Self hosting SigNoz vs using a SaaS vendor
item.description: With changing privacy laws, it's getting riskier to send your data to third party SaaS vendors. In the observability domain, traces and logs are something which you don't want to send outside. Let's find out why self-hosted software solutions are replacing SaaS providers now.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: SigNoz is now SOC 2 Type I compliant
item.description: We’re thrilled to announce that SigNoz is now SOC 2 Type I compliant. We are committed to protecting your data and privacy, and we follow the industry’s best practices to ensure that your data is safe and secure.

item.description: Why we felt there was a need for a full-stack open source observability platform and how we went about building it.

item.title: Why are we building SigNoz?
item.description: In the world of microservices, who takes care of failures? How do you solve availability and performance issues quickly in your production environment. For a modern-day distributed system, observability needs to be built within the system. And, SigNoz attempts to bring you the best open-source observability stack for your distributed system.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)
